mapper.update:
update employee
emp_pwd = #{empPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_type = #{empType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=DATE},

where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
